New Records: Romania secured a 3-0 victory in their Nations League opener against Kosovo
Key Match Events: Dennis Man scored the first goal in the 40th minute with an assist from Răzvan Marin
Răzvan Marin converted a penalty in the 51st minute after Dennis Man was fouled
Denis Drăguș scored the third goal in the 82nd minute
Pre-Game Insights: Mircea Lucescu made his debut as Romania's national team coach
Post-Match Reflections: The victory provides a strong start for Romania under the new coach
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Stadiumi Fadil Vokrri in Priština with 12,872 attendees
